data.title: Secure IDriveÂ® Cloud Storage
data.meta_description: IDrive cloud storage works like a central vault for storing all your files - and includes bonus sync storage space! Access and share files from any Mac or PC via the Internet.
data.text:
IDrive is fast, easy to set up, and simple to use-and you won't find a better price per terabyte for backing up your devices.

- Justin Pot, June 18, 2024

Store your files online and access them from anywhere!

IDrive cloud storage is convenient for storing all types of files - finance sheets, important documents, media files, and more - just like your computer. With IDrive mobile apps for iOS and Android, you can work on your files from anywhere. Enjoy all these benefits without the hassle of managing hard drive space.

Cloud Drive

All your files and folders will be synced in real time across all the devices that you link using IDrive. Sync storage does not impact your backup storage, and matches your backup storage limit.

Share and Collaborate

Share your synced files with associates via email for easy collaboration. Managing your shared files is easy too - you have the share access control to change the access rights at any time.
